website_summaries.verdict: A compact wall-mounted toothbrush holder that's easy on any budget.
pros: Easily adheres to the wall with double-sided tape
Cover to shield toothbrush from germs
Compact design works great in small spaces
cons: Some have said the slots are too big for the brushes

customer_reviews.title: Good holder and doesn't drop brushes
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mounted holder. The included strips are good but are a PITA to peel. Was not happy about that but that doesn't mean the product doesn't deserve full marks. We installed in our motorhome and it holds up well while we have traveled. The lid has not popped open and holds all our tooth brushes. Was a good purchase. Customer service: recommend looking into your glue strips not peeling without ripping the padding up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Demo

customer_reviews.title: Must be screwed to the wall
customer_reviews.text: keeps falling off the wall... I even tried to use the 3M mounting tape meant for kitchen/bathrooms to hold it but it still comes down in a day (one time dropping my toothbrush into the toilet!) Got this so I didn't have to drill into the wall... but ended up drilling anyway as it is a good item... just don't bother using the sticky tapes... screw it in, its not worth the hassle of discovering your toothbrush on the floor (or in worse places) every morning when you need it
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Adhered well, works great.
customer_reviews.text: My son would never put his toothbrush in the toothbrush holder. The water left on the toothbrushes would slide down and sit in the bottom of the toothbrush holder and he hated the end of his toothbrush getting nasty because of this. When I saw this product I figured we would try it. When my son saw it he was ecstatic, because he would no longer have a dirty toothbrush. He now hangs his toothbrush with no fuss. The application was simple, and it has stuck to the wall extremely well. If we ever move this will definitely come with us or I will have to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I never thought I'd like this little gadget so much
customer_reviews.text: This handy little gadget keeps your toothbrush covered when not in use, away from bacteria and other nasties present in bathrooms. It stuck easily and is very secure. I put it on my mirror hoping it would be easier to remove if necessary (since I worried about paint coming off with the adhesive) Getting the toothbrush in and out is simple, and the brush stays protected. Such a simple idea that I wish I'd discovered long ago! Definitely a 5 star product. (Now if only it came in a choice of colors...)
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: The tape is trash. The product is great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tooth bursh holder. But not the doublr sided tape on the back. It fell a few times. I took the tape off and bought new humidity resistant heavy duty double sided tape. And no problem!. Its been holding 4 toothbrush for a couple of months. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Hurtado B.

customer_reviews.title: Holding steady
customer_reviews.text: Mind you this is a very inexpensive item but super easy to install and given me no problems. Based on other adhesive products I maintained solid pressure for a full 30 seconds and it is still secure. Tooth flip lid hadn’t opened even during bumpy roads. Love it. Cleans up and organizes medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Frink

customer_reviews.title: bought two!
customer_reviews.text: Had them for a couple weeks now. I had to trim the gate to fit the kids battery toothbrushes a bit with an Xacto knife (very easy to do). Everything fits perfect! I did use Gorilla glue on one that would not stick to the tile but I believe it is because my bathroom is NOT vented properly and it fell off during a steamy shower. NO fault of the product. You will not be sorry. The kids got the hang of closing the lid after use quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but won't work with Sonicare heads unless you keep the plastic cover they come with
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of this for our camper. My toothbrush has a cover that I got from walmart. It's too big and won't fit. My daughter's sonicare has the plastic cover that came with it and it works great and stays in. My husband's sonicare has no cover at all and it slips through and won't stay in the holder. It works great with regular toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: karapg

customer_reviews.title: Ok for home use. Not for RV use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and installed in our RV. It pops open on every trip. The flap simply will not stay closed during movement. Last tripI found my toothbrush on the kitchen floor. So, if you have it for home use, it works fine and costs little. But in a moving RV, not a single brush will be in place when you arrive at your destination.
customer_reviews.author: J. Samson

customer_reviews.title: We bought it for the camper and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to say other than it does function well. It mounts to the wall with double sided tape and has a lid that closes to help secure the toothbrush(s) in place. We bought it for the camper and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Saves Space
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my kids' bathroom to save counter space and also because the toilet is in the same room as the sink. It grossed me out to think of microscopic fecal matter on their toothbrushes. I installed this with Command Strips, and it has held up great. I liked it so much, I bought a second one for the bathroom my husband and I share. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abbekins79

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toothbrush holder!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always grossed out when I have to clean the toothbrush holder and it has nasty gunk at the bottom of the cup. I bought this to get rid of that problem. I used their adhesive to attach it to the inside of the medicine cabinet. I read other reviews that said it fell off and that it wouldn't hold little kid toothbrushes...I haven't had any trouble with it, at all. It's been several months and it's still sturdy. It holds two little kid toothbrushes, no problem. This was a great toothbrush holder for a great price. I'm happy with my purchase and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I got rid of a toothbrush holder that was taking up space on the sink and replaced it with this little device. I love that it has the cover so you can keep dust away or whatever flying bacteria may come at it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane from TX

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if it didn't open in travel
customer_reviews.text: This is great, until you haul the camper somewhere. Even on 10 mile trips it opens and loses toothbrushes. Would be a good idea to remake with some kind of a latch or hook to keep it closed. I just use a piece of tape...when I remember.
customer_reviews.author: sara astheimer

customer_reviews.title: Essential in any bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, super secure and will NOT fall off. Not sure how easy to get off or what mess it leaves behind but sturdy, great price, and keeps our toothbrushes sanitary in there bathroom without having to hide them in a cabinet yet neatly tucked away still.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Poor adhesion
customer_reviews.text: I bought for our camper. If it doesn't fall off the wall the toothbrushes fall out of it. I can screw it to the wall but I really was hoping it would adhere to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I was debating buying two 2 capacity holders or this one. In the past, the smaller holder held up very well for years. This one lasted for a couple of weeks. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for kids
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our trailer and it helps keep the bathroom space organized and that valuable counter space doesn’t get cluttered with toothbrushes. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a camper.  Just wish the slide back lid was more durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our camper trailer. It is not very durable or secure, when you lift the flap back to reveal the toothbrushs; but it works for what it's made for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I did not want to drill holes in our new camper walls. I was able to install myself. It sticks very well. I love that it locks the brushes in place as we travel. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Camco A Pop-A-Toothbrush Wall Mounted Holder With Germ Protecting Cover
customer_reviews.text: No more brushes laying on small space around the sink. Working out very good in our camper. Cover holds them in place when driving. A lot more sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman Stan

customer_reviews.title: just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our camper in the bathroom on the inside of the door and it worked perfectly. So easy to install - took like 2 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: slammer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: First one we had gotten was broken amazon took care of it right away thumbs up for them. Wife put it up in our camper and what else can I say it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So useful in our very small travel trailer bathroom. Hangs inside the cabinet door and the cover closes automatically. I think it's very sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: I love this Holder
customer_reviews.text: This holder changed my life. I hanged it on the mirror and my whole bathroom counter looks cleaner and more organized. It is a bit annoying to constantly open and close the cover, so I keep it open for most of the times.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Handy for both RV and home use
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my camper and in my home medicine cabinet. I used my sticker maker to put everyone's names to brushes wouldn't get mixed up. Good item.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Munar

customer_reviews.title: Innovative As Usual
customer_reviews.text: Like most Camco products, this offers innovation and great value for the money. Maybe suction cups on the back would be next-level.
customer_reviews.author: devynatorsmom

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great needed to find a different way to get my kids to remember to put there tooth brush away they love being able to close the lid when they are done brushing
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Mama

customer_reviews.title: Doing its job.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a toothbrush holder for my shower toothbrush and this did the trick. I stuck it right on the shower tile. This thing even holds a travel toothpaste on top.
customer_reviews.author: Elle r.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hook to inside of Medicine Cab. door!
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but cover opens too easy and tooth brushes fall out when med. cab. is closed. (attached to inside of med. cab. door)
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: Inside medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Installed inside medicine cabinet to keep my vanity clutter free. Works for a smaller neck razors as well as tooth brushes. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Camper perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the camper, easy to hang and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an RV
customer_reviews.text: Used for our travel trailer .... wish we had gotten this years ago!!! Perfect for the family’s toothbrushes
customer_reviews.author: Someonethatshops

customer_reviews.title: No wrestling to get the toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Surprised it came with mounting tape to mount instead of screws, but has holes for screws. No more worrying about flying fecal matter on my toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install and looks nice. We just put it in the camper so I can't say it lasts forever yet.
customer_reviews.author: SuAnn

customer_reviews.title: Every RV-er needs this!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely used the pre drilled holes to mount this since the sticky strips were not strong enough. Absolutely love having a place to keep tooth brushes during travel and stay. The cover is super easy to open and close, and is great to have to keep the brushes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great deal !
customer_reviews.text: Really great item and great deal, I do suggest this for keeping toothbrushes sanitary, and doesn’t look bad in bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McD

customer_reviews.title: Holds strong
customer_reviews.text: Been in my RV for almost a month. Holds strong. Either people can’t use a sticker or they changed the tape it comes with. .
customer_reviews.author: S. Bier

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This fits right in the medicine cabinet of our camper, helps keep toothbrushes organized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The toothbrush cover is really useful, but the adhesive provided for the backing did ...
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush cover is really useful, but the adhesive provided for the backing did not work too well. I've only had it up for a few weeks, and it has already slipped off the wall....
customer_reviews.author: Rpm

customer_reviews.title: Great for camper
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to go in our camper bathroom. It fits all of our toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Tina W.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Wished I saw this when I had my first trailer. I put labels on it so people can remember which toothbrush is theirs.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive did NOT work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive did not stick at all. I even prepared the area. I had to use double sided tape I luckily had on hand. I did not return the holder. The holder however was exactly what I was looking for. Seems great for my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: miles king

customer_reviews.title: Toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: Keeps our toothbrushes clean and out of the way. Perfect for a camper. Hold well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha King

customer_reviews.title: Fits all tooth brushes
customer_reviews.text: This was a great way to get the brushes off the counter and fits any kind of toothbrush
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay up
customer_reviews.text: Love this for our camper but it fell off the wall. Adhesion not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ap

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, sticks well
customer_reviews.text: Installed in camper, sticks the walls well and looks just as the photos show.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Stays put during Travel!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked amazingly. We all get a "camping" toothbrush every season to keep in the camper so its one less thing we need to remember. I love that you can actually leave them in this holder and they stay in during travel!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if it would stay up. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lego Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier than using a small glass to store them . So far .... they are sticking to our RV wall!
customer_reviews.author: dmg56

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. Tooth brushes fell out while driving to destination in RV.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Hung it to the wall in the camper bathroom in just a few minutes. Easy to install, stayed put.
customer_reviews.author: MommaW

customer_reviews.title: Make life easier!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the our trailer. Easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Naple

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Two camping trips so far and the adhesion is still holding. If the adhesion fails it is easy to replace with better stuff. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect for our camper. Keeps brushes clean and protected.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy L Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Works so far.
customer_reviews.text: Received and installed in RV. Hoping the adhesive withstands the AZ summers/heat.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfee

customer_reviews.title: Great for RV
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Put it in our RV and it is great for keeping toothbrushes where they belong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Mounted easy and going on 3rd camping season with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Carefulbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but it does what it’s meant to do. Adhesive was something to be inproved but it holds.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my small bathroom, which has limited counter space. Keeps the toothbrushes contained and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush mount
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy mount. Attaches well and the flip top secured the brushes during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: and rips very easily. You're better off buying a box of Nitrile ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is too thin, and rips very easily. You're better off buying a box of Nitrile gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Phantom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the camper!
customer_reviews.text: We needed something in our camper bathroom to put our toothbrushes in and I ordered this to help save space. It is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great value sturdy and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: So far still sticks and works perfect for out rv
customer_reviews.author: jennifer goulding

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Really perfect for the camper. Tucked in nicely under the mirror and the cover keeps the toothbrushes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jodeebee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and product exactly as described. Good quality, fit my rv cabinet perfectly. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my RV. Saves counter space. Hygienic. It just works. Mounting adhesive is strong. Great price, as well.
customer_reviews.author: JC W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The top can be a little weird, but it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Ralphy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to install, and has lasted with no issues so far with constant use between 4 people for the past 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Good quality and easy to install. Holds 4 toothbrushes of any kind, and very good price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary W

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: Held up for us this past 4 day trip. The lid functions well and does not stick. Seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! No more finding the kids toothbrushs every where.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive works
customer_reviews.text: Perfect holder, used the adhesive in our Prime Time travel trailer and worked great. I was concerned as the wall is not smooth but it stuck and holds our 4 toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: jozzy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I will use it. Feels like a junker dollar store item. Marked up x10 and huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Dennel R.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the toothbrushes up off the counter noir camper and didn’t take up room in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Best RV Toothbrush holder around.
customer_reviews.text: Our toothbrushes are not flying around the RV Wet bath anymore. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small and efficient. It does the job it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: R. Koch

customer_reviews.title: But other then that we love it! It's very handy for our family of ...
customer_reviews.text: We had to screw it into the wall of our camper because the sticky pads didn't stay stuck very well. But other then that we love it! It's very handy for our family of four!
customer_reviews.author: marshall dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Just what you would expect. Easy to install and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ballard

customer_reviews.title: It met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was white and when I got it was black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Camco A Pop-A-Toothbrush Wall Mounted Holder With Germ Protecting Cover, Perfect For Traveling, Dorm Bathrooms and More, Holds 4 Toothbrushes- (White) (57204)
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe Camco Pop-A-Toothbrush is a hygienic toothbrush holder designed to mount the wall in our RV bathroom. Fits four toothbrushes, double-sided mounting tape is included.
feature_bullets: Designed to mount the wall in our RV bathroom or kitchen

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars481 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
